collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (5 total Queries, 5 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT CON_nomConcours, CON_idConcours,CON_edition, organisateur(CON_idConcours) AS organisateur, phase_actuelle(CON_idConcours) AS phase_actuelle, CON_dateDebut, CON_image, CON_description, donner_dates(CON_idConcours) AS dates, donner_categories(CON_idConcours) AS categorie, donner_jury(CON_idConcours) AS juges FROM T_CONCOURS_CON GROUP BY CON_idConcours ORDER BY phase_actuelle;

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT CON_nomConcours, CON_idConcours,CON_edition, organisateur(CON_idConcours) AS organisateur, phase_actuelle(CON_idConcours) AS phase_actuelle, CON_dateDebut, CON_image, CON_description, donner_dates(CON_idConcours) AS dates, donner_categories(CON_idConcours) AS categorie, donner_jury(CON_idConcours) AS juges FROM T_CONCOURS_CON GROUP BY CON_idConcours ORDER BY phase_actuelle;
